translation.en: Alpha Base, still no sign of the creature.
translation.it: Base Alfa, ancora nessun segno della creatura.

translation.en: Captain Lightspeed, our trackers show that Cruncher is right behind you.

translation.en: Negative Alpha Base. Believe me, if it was right on top of me, I'd know.
translation.it: Base Alfa Negativo. Credimi, se fosse dietro di me, lo saprei.

translation.en: It's right on top of me!
-I prepared you a light lunch. -[roars]
translation.it: Ti ho preparato un pranzo leggero.

translation.en: Here you go, chubby.
Is that a muffin-top I see?
Ugh! Forget weapons. I should've brought some breath mints.
translation.it: Dimentica le armi. Avrei dovuto portare delle mentine.

translation.en: But you can start flossing with this.
translation.it: Inizia a usare il filo interdentale.

translation.en: Or not.
Time to wake up the babies.
translation.it: È ora di svegliare i bambini.

translation.en: [Reid] Wake up the babies?
Oh, cool.
Whenever they refer to weapons as babies, you know it's gonna be sick.
translation.it: Ogni volta che chiamano così le armi, sarà da paura.

translation.en: [Buckethead laughs] Dude, are you kidding me?
You're at the second to last level of Planet Master.
translation.it: Sei al penultimo livello del Planet Master.

translation.en: Nobody's ever made it this far.
translation.it: Nessuno è mai arrivato fin qui.

translation.en: That's why my screen name is Fearless and not Buckethead.
translation.it: Ecco perché il mio nome è Impavido e non Testadilatta.

translation.en: You've gotta come up with a better name than Buckethead.
translation.it: Devi trovare un nome migliore di Testadilatta.

translation.en: [Zoinker] Why? His head is an empty bucket.
-[Buckethead] Shut your face. -[Wonderpunk] Watch the tail.
-Watch it. -[Zoinker] The spikes are poisonous.
[Buckethead] Let the man concentrate.
Yeah, you're talking to the guy who jumped a rocket cycle over Apocalypse Canyon.
translation.it: Parlate con chi ha saltato un razzo sul Canyon dell'Apocalisse.

translation.en: Okay, let's wake up the babies. What could they be?
translation.it: Ok, svegliamo i bambini. Cosa saranno?

translation.en: Sonic blast cannons? Plasma laser disintegrators?
translation.it: Cannoni sonici? Disintegratori laser al plasma?

translation.en: Molten molecule melters?
Welcome to Bring Your Children to Work Day.
translation.it: Benvenuti alla Giornata dei Bambini Lavoratori.

translation.en: -Real... babies? -[Zoinker] This has gotta be a joke.
[Wonderpunk] What do these babies have, superpower puke?
I climbed to the top of the toughest video game ever made
translation.it: Sono arrivato in fondo al gioco più difficile di semrpe

translation.en: just to change diapers and sing lullabies?
translation.it: per cambiare i pannolini e cantare ninne nanne?

translation.en: All right, kids, let's see if you remember what Daddy's been teaching you
translation.it: Bene, ragazzi, vediamo se vi ricordate cosa vi ha insegnato papà.

translation.en: after nap time.
translation.it: vediamo se vi ricordate cosa vi ha insegnato papà.

translation.en: -Little bigger than a salad fork, buddy. -Ah!
translation.it: Un po' più grande di una forchetta.

translation.en: Ah, you'll get there.
Trust me, kids, when you get bigger, so will your powers.
translation.it: Fidatevi, quando diventerete grandi, avrete i poteri.

translation.en: Watch Daddy.
[Buckethead] Can we blow something up? These babies are boring.
translation.it: Possiamo detonare qualcosa? I bambini sono noiosi.

translation.en: They'll cost me the mission. Isn't there a space stroller I can put these kids in?
translation.it: Mi costerà la missione. Non c'è un passeggino spaziale?

translation.en: [Buckethead] You hit that final level. You're a gamer god!
translation.it: Hai raggiunto l'ultimo livello. Sei un dio gamer!

translation.en: Call me Fearless.
Nothing can stop me now.
Nothing!
Oh, except her.
-Hey, Mom. -[Mom] Hi, sweetie.Just checkin' in.
I wanna make sure you're not playing video games while we're gone all weekend.
translation.it: Non giocherai per tutto il weekend mentre siamo via, vero?

translation.en: -That's ridiculous. -[Mom] And I'm reminding you
translation.it: - Ma è ridicolo. - E ti ricordo

translation.en: that your science project is due in two weeks.
translation.it: che hai il progetto scientifico tra due settimane.

translation.en: -Your partner still coming over tonight? -Yup.
translation.it: - Il tuo compagno verrà stasera? - Sì.

translation.en: -This guy's a monster. -[Mom] What?
Uh, it's a monster homework assignment, and I'm on it.

translation.en: [Dad] Make sure he fills out the college application!
translation.it: Assicurati che compili la domanda per il college.

translation.en: I will, I just have to, uh, finish, a couple more things.

translation.en: -[Dad] Like another video game! -I'm-- That's not what I'm doing at all.
translation.it: Un altro videogioco? Non sto... Non è quello che sto facendo.

translation.en: [Mom] We should go. Dad's giving the keynote in a few minutes,
translation.it: Dvremmo andare. Papà farà il discorso tra poco

translation.en: and you know how he gets gassy
-when he gets nervous. -Okay, TMI.
translation.it: - se è agitato. - Ok, non voglio sapere.

translation.en: -Enjoy the weekend. Don't worry about me. -[Mom] Okay. Bye, sweetie.
translation.it: - Buon weekend. Non preoccupatevi per me. - Va bene. Ciao, tesoro.

translation.en: -Honey? -Yup, me too, bye.
Okay, let's finish this beast.
-Death by geyser? It's a rough way to go. -[giggle]
[Reid] And cue the music, that sweet sound.

translation.en: Ooh, there we go. I'm victor.
[Arcannis] Captain Lightspeed. In my way once again.
translation.it: Capitano LightSpeed. Di nuovo sulla mia strada.

translation.en: Dr. Arcannis.
Aha. Arcannis.
-This is the guy I wanna take out. -[Buckethead] Shoot him, man. He looks like asparagus.
translation.it: - Ecco chi voglio eliminare. - Sparagli. Sembra un asparago.

translation.en: So pathetic, using your children to fight your battles for you.
translation.it: Come sei patetico, usare i tuoi figli per combattere per te.

translation.en: They'll probably grow up just like their father.
I bet you wonder what that's like.
This is far from over, Captain.
I will never stop until I obliterate you from the universe
translation.it: Non mi fermerò finché non ti cancellerò dall'universo

translation.en: and conquer every planet in my path.
translation.it: e conquisterò ogni pianeta sulla mia strada.

translation.en: You can make all the deadly threats you want.
But you don't have superpowers, and you never will.
translation.it: Ma non hai superpoteri e non li avrai mai.

translation.en: [grunts] This isn't over, Lightspeed.
Wherever heroes are needed, we'll be there.
translation.it: Ovunque servano gli eroi, noi saremo lì.

translation.en: I'll have all your powers and more
translation.it: Avrò tutti i tuoi poteri e anche di più

translation.en: when I take it to the next level.
translation.it: quando lo porterò al livello successivo.

translation.en: [Buckethead] You're about to get to the final level.
translation.it: Amico, stai per arrivare al livello finale.

translation.en: -[Zoinker] That's crazy! -[Wonderpunk] Insane!
This is big. Fearless is about to become a household name.
translation.it: È incredibile. Impavido diventerà un nome conosciuto.

translation.en: But first, I gotta get rid of these babies.
translation.it: Ma prima, devo liberarmi di questi bambini.

translation.en: They're just gonna slow me down.
Let me see if I-- Oh, here we go, Daycare.
translation.it: Vediamo se... Oh, ecco. Asilo nido.

translation.en: Okay. Looks like I can drop them off while they grow their powers.
translation.it: Oh, ecco. Asilo nido. Posso lasciarli lì mentre aumentano i poteri.

translation.en: [Zoinker] And fill their diapers.
[Reid] Let a babysitter change 'em, not me.
translation.it: Ci penserà la babysitter, non io.

translation.en: [Captain] Their powers are weak right now.
I'm hoping they can rest up and grow them here.
translation.it: Spero possano riposare e che crescano.

translation.en: I hate to let them out of my sight,
but I have a debriefing with the Galactic Council.
translation.it: ma ho una riunione col Consiglio Galattico.

translation.en: -Mm-hmm. -Their mother's at a weekend seminar:
translation.it: La madre è a un seminario:

translation.en: "The Dos and Don'ts of Battling Black Hole Scorpions."
translation.it: "Come battere gli Scorpioni del Buco Nero."

translation.en: -You got all of their snacks, right? -Yes, Captain.
translation.it: - Ha gli snack, vero? - Sì, Capitano.

translation.en: In case of emergency, you can reach me using this.
translation.it: - Per emergenza, mi chiami con questo. - Capito.

translation.en: -Got it. -My interplanetary communicator. -I've seen one before. -Oh.
translation.it: - È un comunicatore interplanetario. - Lo so.

translation.en: All right.
-There you... go. -You can let go.
Daddy loves you, baby.
Just remember that I'll always-- Okay, she's gone.
[Wonderpunk] How do we get from babysitting to winning this game?
translation.it: Come passiamo da babysitter a vincere la partita?

translation.en: [Zoinker] Let's get back to blasting stuff.
translation.it: - Esplosioni! - Sì, saltiamo le scene tagliate

translation.it: - Esplosioni! - Sì, saltiamo le scene tagliate e torniamo all'azione.

translation.en: On second thought, I don't wanna miss anything.
translation.it: No, non voglio perdermi niente. Uno dei bambini

translation.en: [Buckethead] Good point. Smart move. That's why you're number one and I'm--
translation.it: - potrebbe deporre un uovo di Pasqua. - Giusto. Ecco perché sei al primo posto e io...

translation.en: -Two thousandth and ninety-eighth. -[Buckethead] Ouch. That hurt.
As their powers increase, we make sure each baby gets a palladium pacifier.
translation.it: Man mano che i loro poteri aumentano, mettiamo loro un ciuccio palladium.

translation.en: This neutralizes their power, so they don't use them, accidentally.
translation.it: Questo neutralizza il loro potere, così non lo useranno per sbaglio.

translation.en: Of course, yes, I remember.
All of our playrooms are reinforced steel, laser-repellent, flame-retardant,
translation.it: Tutte le nostre sale sono ignifughe, rinforzate, laser repellente

translation.en: earthquake-proof, radiation-proof.
Oh, and tinkle-proof.
-Fleech. -Ah!
Focus.
It's time to steal some babies.

translation.en: -[making gun noises] -And no, you may not eat them.
[Arcannis] Come on.
Here.
I can only hope you're as strong as your father.
translation.it: Spero solo che tu sia forte come tuo padre.

translation.en: Creates anything he imagines.
Just imagine.
Kira. The girl child of Captain Lightspeed.
translation.it: Kira. La bambina del Capitano Lightspeed.

translation.en: -You may be the most powerful of all. -Mmm.
translation.it: Sarai la più potente di tutti.

translation.en: -[toy squeaking] -You fool!
I love you. You're my best fri--

translation.en: He just stole the babies. Wow, this is heating up.
translation.it: Ha rubato i bambini Wow, si sta scaldando.

translation.en: -[Buckethead] Watch out for traps. -I gotta wrap this up soon.

translation.en: Melanie is coming over. We gotta work on our science project.
translation.it: Devo chiudere presto. Melanie sta arrivando. - Abbiamo il progetto scientifico. - Oh. Melanie. È una forza.

translation.en: -[Zoinker] Melanie. She's fire. -[Buckethead] You're lucky.
translation.it: - Abbiamo il progetto scientifico. - Oh. Melanie. È una forza. Che fortuna, è anche intelligente. A me tocca Louise!

translation.en: She's really smart too. I got Lunch Room Louise. Ugh!
translation.it: Che fortuna, è anche intelligente. A me tocca Louise!

translation.en: With any luck Melanie will do the project for me.

translation.en: -[Zoinker] Sorry, I'm out. Dinner time. -[Wonderpunk] Me too.

translation.en: Finally. Back to TheObsidian.
Yes. This is gonna be tight!

translation.en: -Fleech. -[yells]
Hook up the subjects to The Extrapolator.
[gasps] This chair's all sweaty and... moist.

translation.en: Captain Lightspeed.You look distraught.
translation.it: Capitano Lightspeed. - Sembri sconvolto. - Arcannis. Feccia!

translation.en: Arcannis. You filth!
You took my children! If you touch one hair--
translation.it: Hai preso i miei figli! Se torci un capello...

translation.en: Please. Spare me your needless declarations and warnings.

translation.en: I just called to thank you for giving me the idea, Captain.
translation.it: Ho chiamato per ringraziarti per avermi dato l'idea.

translation.en: "You don't have superpowers, and you never will."
translation.it: "Non hai superpoteri e non li avrai mai."

translation.en: But what if I found a way?
You see, with my new Extrapolator, I have.
translation.it: Vedi, con il mio nuovo Estrapolatore, li ho.

translation.en: And who better to give them to me than your defenseless offspring?
translation.it: E chi può darmeli meglio della tua prole indifesa?

translation.en: You've always been jealous of my powers. Daddy issues?
translation.it: Sei sempre stato geloso dei miei poteri. Problemi con il papà?

translation.en: -What? -[Captain] Your dad took over 20
translation.it: - Che? - Tuo padre ha preso 20 o 30 pianeti

translation.en: or 30planetsbefore I locked him up.
translation.it: - Che? - Tuo padre ha preso 20 o 30 pianeti prima che lo rinchiudessi.

translation.en: And you? Hang on, let me do the math. Zero.
translation.it: E tu? Aspetta, fammi fare i conti. Zero.

translation.en: I'll conquer all of my father's planets and more.
translation.it: Conquisterò tutti i pianeti di mio padre e oltre.

translation.en: Somebody's a little obsessed.
Obsessed? Obsessed? How dare you!
You sit on your golden throne
translation.it: Ti siedi sul tuo trono dorato

translation.en: high above the rest of us.
I wasn't born with a silver spoon in my mouth. Huh.
translation.it: Io non sono nato con la camicia.

translation.en: But now I will make my own spoon.
translation.it: Ma ora me la cucirò da solo!

translation.en: A spoon that will crush you all.
-That's a pretty big spoon. -It's not a real spoon, Lightspeed!
translation.it: - Che bella camicia. - Non è una camicia vera, Lightspeed!

translation.en: Oh, but how the tide has turned.
translation.it: Ma come sono cambiate le cose.

translation.en: I will harvest your babies' powers,
translation.it: Prenderò i poteri dei tuoi bambini

translation.en: and then nothing can stop me from conquering any planet I wish.
translation.it: e niente potrà impedirmi di conquistare il pianeta che desidero.

translation.en: My master plan is in motion,
translation.it: Il mio piano è in atto,

translation.en: every piece is in place
translation.it: ogni pezzo è al suo posto

translation.en: as your angelic children, peacefully slumbering,
translation.it: come i tuoi angelici figli, che dormono pacificamente,

translation.en: unaware of their contribution to my unstoppable, diabolical powers.
translation.it: ignari del loro contributo ai miei inarrestabili e diabolici poteri.

translation.en: I have anticipated even the slightest error,
translation.it: Ho previsto anche il minimo errore,

translation.en: every detail, every precise calculation in my favor.
translation.it: ogni dettaglio, ogni preciso calcolo a mio favore.

translation.en: I'd love to exchange more deadly threats, but I must get the little ones to my lair.
translation.it: Vorrei scambiare altre minacce mortali, ma devo portare i piccoli nella mia tana.

translation.en: -So much power to consume, so little time. -No--!
translation.it: - Così tanto potere, così poco tempo. - No!

translation.en: -[robot] Welcome aboard. -[cooing]
[robot] Launch code accepted.
Please hang on.
Uh-oh. Warning.
Final level.
Do you accept the consequences? That's the weirdest thing I've ever seen.

translation.en: [Buckethead] That's freaky.
translation.it: - È una cosa davvero strana. - È inquietante.

translation.en: Ah, it's all hype.
translation.it: È fatto apposta. L'hanno messo lì per spaventarmi.

translation.en: They just put that in there to scare me. Nice try.
translation.it: È fatto apposta. L'hanno messo lì per spaventarmi. Bel tentativo.

translation.en: Time for Fearless to become a legend.
translation.it: È ora che Impavido diventi una leggenda.

translation.en: Cool. There's nothing like flying through a wormhole.

translation.en: [Buckethead snickers] Worm hole.
This calls for more caffeine.
[Buckethead] Hear that. I'm gonna go eat a pie.

translation.en: -Okay. -[door bell rings]
Oh, not now.
-Hang on. -[whirling]
Okay, you don't have to knock so hard. I heard the bell the first time.

translation.en: Jeez Louise.
translation.it: ho sentito il campanello la prima volta.

translation.en: -General Blazerhatch. -[General] I'll take a coffee, black.
translation.it: - Generale Blazerhatch. - Prendo un caffè, nero.

translation.en: What's the skinny on our UFO?
The object came from outside Earth's atmosphere at 1900 hours.
translation.it: Veniva da fuori l'atmoferma terrestre a 1900 ore.

translation.en: We're picking up vital signs from inside the object.
Sweet God in heaven.
I guess I'll take that coffee... to go.

translation.en: No! No!
Imbecile.
You pile of worthless skin cells.
You only had to get them into The Extrapolator.
Let's go hunting.
Melanie. Hey. Hi. Uh, come on in.
I'm not interrupting anything, am I?
No. I was just saving the world.
translation.it: No. Stavo solo salvando il mondo.

translation.en: You know, uh, Planet Master?
[scoffs] I don't really play video games.
Yeah, I'm kind of a big deal online. Fearless, that's my gamer tag.
translation.it: Sì, beh, io sono un pezzo grosso online. Mi chiamo Impavido.

translation.en: Hmm. Yeah. I spend my time studying. Really focused on graduating right now.
translation.it: Sì. Io passo il tempo a studiare. Sono concentrata sul diploma.

translation.en: Oh, yeah, yeah, yeah. Me too.
I figure if we work on this 3 hours a night for 2 nights,
translation.it: Credo che se lavoriamo tre ore a notte, due sere,

translation.en: we'll have this project done this weekend.
Or 2 hours a night over the next week. I have both schedules here.
translation.it: O due ore a sera la settimana prossima. Ho dei programmi qui.

translation.en: Wh-- Whoa, that's a lot of scheduling. Did you schedule any bathroom breaks?
translation.it: Wow, quanti programmi. Hai programmato qualche pausa bagno?

translation.en: Of course. Twice an hour.
This is 30 percent of our grade, Reid. I'm taking it seriously.
translation.it: È il 30% del nostro voto, Reid. Lo prendo sul serio. Buttiamo giù le idee.

translation.en: So let's get to brainstorming.
translation.it: Lo prendo sul serio. Buttiamo giù le idee.

translation.en: -I'm sure you have some ideas. -Sure.
translation.it: - Di sicuro avrai qualche idea. - Certo.

translation.en: Like...
There's solar power.
-Uh, the electricity of light. -[snaps fingers]
Uhhh. Arcannis effect on lightspeed.

translation.en: Space travel!
I was thinking advanced geometric telecommunications.
translation.it: Pensavo a telecomunicazioni a geometria avanzata.

translation.en: Or rocket boots.
You wanna make rocket boots?
-These are just rough ideas. Oh. -[thudding]
See, this-- this is why I'm not a fan of partner projects.

translation.en: I'm usually the only one who does any work.

translation.en: This is gonna be a long night. Might as well take our first break now.
translation.it: Sarà una lunga serata. Tanto vale fare la nostra prima pausa.

translation.en: -Where's your bathroom? -First door down the hall.
translation.it: - Dov'è il bagno? - Corridoio, prima porta.

translation.en: Can you at least crack a notebook while I'm gone?

translation.en: Write down one idea.
I guess she's not gonna do the whole project for me.

translation.en: What?
That was weird.
Baby. Here from the game. [chuckles] Okay…
Uh, well, this can't be actually happening.
-Another one? Did they all come here? -[cooing]
Whoa, whoa, whoa. Bu-- Just stay.
-Ahh. -Whoa. Oh, baby.
Whoa. Don't eat...
No, no, no, no. You can't be here. This doesn't make sense.

translation.en: Just put you back in the game. Uh. Come on. Come on!
What is this? I found a baby in here.

translation.en: They're not really-- Here's the thing.

translation.en: These babies are from Planet Master.
Stop with the jokes, Reid. Whose kids are these?

translation.en: It might be hard to believe,
translation.it: Potrebbe essere difficile da credere, ma sono...

translation.en: but these are actually the children of… Captain Lightspeed.
translation.it: Potrebbe essere difficile da credere, ma sono... di Capitan Lightspeed.

translation.en: And he's in the video game. [chuckles] They have super powers.

translation.en: If you're trying to bail on the science project, just say so.

translation.en: I will figure this out.
Until I do, we can still work on the project.
-I just have to keep them busy. -And how are you gonna do that?

translation.en: Okay, toys. You want toys. Here you go.

translation.en: -This is a shoe, and here is a ball. -[coos]

-[cries] -Oh, what is-- What's happening?

translation.en: Oh, here, these usually work.
I'm gonna go find them something more appropriate to play with.

translation.en: Fine, great.
There's gotta be a cheat code to delete you, or...

translation.en: -[coos] -Where's the third one?
Oh, no, no, no, no, where'd he go? Okay.
Here. Uh, play with this.
-[coos] -Yup, that's a ball.
-[whines] -Yeah, you got it.
-[cries] -Look, I get it, you wanna-- Oh!
And now your powers are getting stronger? Please, not here.

translation.en: Oh. Hey, not the bookshelf. Get down.
You do not throw a book at me, okay? That's not a toy.
translation.it: Ehi, non mi lanci un libro, ok? Non è un giocattolo.

translation.en: And you are a bad baby.
translation.it: E tu sei un bimbo cattivo.

translation.en: Oh! No, no!
What happened? Anybody hurt?
translation.it: Cos'è successo? Vi siete fatti male?

translation.en: Just you. You gotta be more careful around little kids.
translation.it: Oh. Solo tu. Devi stare più attento con i bambini.

translation.en: -They're not just kids-- -You figure out what to do
translation.it: - Non sono solo bambini... - Pensaci tu,

translation.en: with these babies. I'm gonna go work in the kitchen and get something done.
translation.it: io vado a lavorare in cucina e faccio qualcosa.

translation.en: Laugh it up, you little space gremlins.
If I got you here, I'm gonna figure out how to send you back.
translation.it: Se vi ho portati qui, scoprirò come rimandarvi indietro.

translation.en: -[screams] -Oh, shrimp. Okay...
Everything all right?
-Um. Hey, kid, why don't you just-- -[laughs]
What are you trying to do in here? Teach them professional wrestling?
translation.it: Cosa cerchi di fare? Insegnare loro il wrestling?

translation.en: No, I've been trying to tell you, these babies are from Planet Master, the video game.
translation.it: No, ho cercato di dirtelo, questi bambini sono di Planet Master, il gioco.

translation.en: I played the final level and somehow broke the laws of time and space and brought them... here.
translation.it: Ho giocato al livello finale, ho infranto le leggi spazio-tempo ed eccoli qui.

translation.en: Reid, I don't have time for this.
translation.it: Reid, non ho tempo per questo.

translation.en: I came here to work.
-Can you just focus on-- -Put down the couch!
translation.it: - Puoi concentrarti... - Metti giù il divano!

translation.en: Put down what?
-Fine. You wanna play games? -[giggles]
You can keep babysitting or whatever this is.
translation.it: Puoi continuare a fare il babysitter.

translation.en: I'm gonna ask Mrs. Wilson to assign me another partner.
translation.it: Chiederò alla Sig.a Wilson di darmi un altro compagno.

translation.en: -This isn't my fault. It's this game. -You really need to grow up.
translation.it: - Non è colpa mia. È un gioco. - Devi crescere.

translation.en: I'm not gonna let some slacker like you crash my whole GPA.
translation.it: Non permetterò a un fannullone come te di rovinarmi la media.

translation.en: Go back to your video games.
You seem to be more successful there than you are in real life.
translation.it: Sembri avere più successo lì che nella vita reale.

translation.en: Who threw the shoe?
Well, congratulations.
You ruined her night. You ruined my night.
translation.it: Le avete rovinato la serata. E anche a me.

translation.en: You ruined half my house. Well done.
translation.it: Avete rovinato mezza casa. Ben fatto.

translation.en: Oh yeah, give yourself a hand. [claps]
Video game babies.
[Mission Control] Houston, we've lost satellite 1187. Are you seeing…
translation.it: Houston, abbiamo perso il satellite 1187. Vedete...

translation.en: [Houston Control] Mission Control, we are losing your signal, are you...
translation.it: Controllo Missione, stiamo perdendo il segnale, stai…

translation.en: The second object just entered the atmosphere. We're tracking it now.
translation.it: Il secondo oggetto è appena entrato nell'atmosfera. Lo stiamo seguendo.

translation.en: Get me the Pentagon. I want the Air Force ready to shake a big stick at this.
translation.it: Portami il Pentagono. Voglio che l'Air Force sia pronta.

translation.en: Someone hand me an important file.
translation.it: Qualcuno mi dia un file importante.

translation.en: -Put this on a clipboard. -Yes, ma'am.
I want a clipboard handed to me every 2 minutes.
translation.it: Voglio una cartella ogni due minuti.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
I want this retyped in bold Courier font, all caps.
translation.it: Voglio che sia scritto in grassetto, tutto maiuscolo.

translation.en: Yes, ma'am.
When this chopper lands and my black Cadillacs hit the ground,
translation.it: Quando questo elicottero atterra i miei soldati saranno qui,

translation.en: I want a base camp waiting, gentlemen.
No bug-eyed moon man is gonna probe the U.S. of A. on my watch.
translation.it: Nessun uomo lunare strabico potrà sondare gli Stati Uniti di A.

translation.en: [all] Yes, ma'am.
Through a wormhole? From a video game?
translation.it: Attraverso un portale? Da un videogioco?

translation.en: I don't know how to explain it, but we have to send these babies back
translation.it: Non so spiegarlo, ma dobbiamo rimandarli nel gioco.

translation.en: -into the game. -We? There is no "we."
These kids would break Mary Poppins in half.
Hey.
You need to call animal control or the police.
translation.it: Devi chiamare la protezione animali o la polizia.

translation.en: No cops. Last thing I need is that phone call to my parents.
translation.it: Niente poliziotti. Non voglio che i miei lo sappiano.

translation.en: I'm outta here. You're on your own. Are you crazy?
-I can't handle this on my own! -[baby squeals]
translation.it: Sei pazza? Come faccio da solo?

translation.en: Please help me. Just until I can send them back where they came from.
translation.it: Ti prego, aiutami. Solo finché li rimanderò indietro.

translation.en: Wrangling space babies was not part of my schedule today, okay?
translation.it: Gestire bambini spaziali non era parte del mio programma, ok?

translation.en: Hmm. You are pathetic.
-[babies cooing] -I gotta call my parents.
Thank you.
Mom. Yeah, I know.
This big project just got... a lot bigger than I thought.
translation.it: Questo grosso progetto è diventato molto più grosso di quanto pensassi.

translation.en: Might go pretty late.
Okay. Bye!
What? Ew.
Uh. What's--
-[Reid] Oh, smells so bad I can see it. -[Melanie] That's pure human suffering.
translation.it: Oddio, come puzza! È pura sofferenza umana.

translation.en: [Captain] I finally found your secret lair, Arcannis.
translation.it: Ho finalmente trovato il tuo covo, Arcannis.

translation.en: [base leader] Captain, careful. Walking into that lair
translation.it: Capitano, attento. Quel covo è come una lasagna a sette strati di morte.

translation.en: is like walking into a seven layer lasagna of death.
translation.it: Quel covo è come una lasagna a sette strati di morte.

translation.en: Then get me my bib.
I'm going in to get my babies back, and it's about to get messy.
translation.it: Vado a riprendermi i miei bambini e sta per succedere un disastro.

translation.en: [Captain] Nine against one? That hardly seems fair.
translation.it: Nove contro uno? Non sembra giusto.

translation.en: Looks like you guys could use a recharge.
[game narrator] Game on.
Power up.
Hold it down.
Sorry. Did I cut you off?
[game narrator echoing] Level up.
Thanks for the workout, guys.
Palladium? I've got no powers.
Surprise.
I'm not here right now.
And neither are your precious children.
translation.it: E neanche i tuoi preziosi figli.

translation.en: Please, make yourself at home.
translation.it: Fai come se fossi a casa tua.

translation.en: If your home is a maze of merciless death traps!
translation.it: Una casa-labirinto di spietate trappole mortali!

translation.en: I'm no good at mazes!
[Arcannis] Ugh. Fleech.
So sorry, master.
Give me the scanner.
All right, then.
This blasted planet is thick with interference.
translation.it: Questo pianeta è pieno di interferenze.

translation.en: Radio waves, satellite waves.
It's time for a little help from my friends.
translation.it: È ora di chiedere aiuto ai miei amici.

translation.en: Hello, my darlings. Off you go.
Find my little runaways.
-Fleech, did you set this on stun? -Ah.
Hm. Yes, you did.
The pod is close.
It appears we have landed on...
-Earth? -Verr...
That's the name?
-Sounds like a stomach virus. -Ew. Or the name of a pet worm.
translation.it: Sembra un virus allo stomaco. O il nome di un verme domestico.

translation.en: Or a type of mucous.
-[imitates farting sounds] -Uh. Yes. That's it.
When a Noglar squats in the woods...
translation.it: Quando un Noglar si accovaccia nel bosco,

translation.en: it takes an "earth."
Oh. Wow.
Is this what I think it is?
-Oh. -[Captain] You evil scum.
I'm gonna blast you into the Jade Nebula when I find you.
translation.it: Ti sparo nella Nebulosa di Giada quando ti trovo.

translation.en: -Captain Lightspeed? Is that you? -Who are you talking to?
translation.it: - Capitano LightSpeed? Sei tu? - Con chi parli?

translation.en: It's the captain, you know? Remember the-- Oh.
This is Captain Darius Lightspeed, Galactic Defense Commander.
translation.it: Capitano Darius Lightspeed, Comando Difesa Galattica.

translation.en: Uh, this is Reid. Senior, McKinley High School.
translation.it: Sono Reid. Ultimo anno, liceo McKinley.

translation.en: What have you done with my children, Reid Senior McKinley High School?
translation.it: Che cos'hai fatto ai miei figli, Reid Ultimo Anno Liceo McKinley?

translation.en: I'll vaporize you where you stand!
Hold on. We're on the same side. I've been on a hundred missions with you.
translation.it: Aspetta. Siamo dalla tua parte. Ho fatto cento missioni con te.

translation.en: Shooting plasma falcons, breaking out of gravity prison,
translation.it: Ho sparato ai falchi al plasma, sono evaso dalla prigione gravitazionale, i vermi.

translation.en: -remember the worm people? -Is he wearing a Danskin?
translation.it: Ho sparato ai falchi al plasma, sono evaso dalla prigione gravitazionale, i vermi. Indossa i leggings?

translation.en: [both] It's called a uniform!
-Did I call at a bad time? -Nothin' I can't handle.
translation.it: - Ho chiamato in un brutto momento? - Non fa niente.

translation.en: Just another day on the job.
Don't change the subject. Do you have my babies or not?
translation.it: Non cambiare argomento. Hai i miei figli o no?

translation.en: [Reid] I do have them. They've destroyed my home.
translation.it: Sì! Mi hanno distrutto la casa.

translation.en: You need to pick them up ASAP.
Reid, no other mission is more important than this.
translation.it: Reid, nessun'altra missione è più importante di questa.

translation.en: I need you to keep my kids safe.
Use their palladium pacifiers to neutralize their powers.
translation.it: Usa i ciucci palladium per neutralizzare i loro poteri.

translation.en: Right. Okay.
There's more. If you have the babies, Arcannis is coming for you.
translation.it: C'è dell'altro. Se hai tu i bambini, Arcannis ti cercherà.

translation.en: Arcannis, who?
Dr. Arcannis.
The most devious criminal mind in the galaxy.
translation.it: La mente criminale più subdola della galassia.

translation.en: Yup, that's the guy.
Looks like the Grinch got some bad plastic surgery.
translation.it: Sembra aver subito una brutta chirurgia plastica.

translation.en: If he gets a hold of my children, he will take their powers as his own.
translation.it: Se prende i miei figli, prenderà i loro poteri per sé.

translation.en: And the first planet he conquers will be yours.
translation.it: E il primo pianeta che conquisterà sarà il tuo.

translation.en: Okay. I'm out.
I'm afraid you've both been marked.
-I don't wanna be marked. -Well, you are.
If I can track you, so can he. He probably already knows where you are.
translation.it: Vi ho rintracciati, lo farà anche lui. Saprà dove siete.

translation.en: Give me a second to trace your signal, and I'll be able to locate you.
translation.it: Un attimo, rintraccio il segnale e vi localizzo.

translation.en: I can't be marked. I've got my own plans. I wanna go to college.
translation.it: Non può essere. Ho i miei piani. Voglio andare al college.

translation.en: I wanna get married.
I still have a $200 Sephora gift card I've never spent, and now I'm marked.
translation.it: Ho ancora un buono da Sephora da 200 dollari e sono segnata.

translation.en: -Dada. -No, no, no, don't!
-No! -No!
He's gone.
How's he gonna find us now?
Reid. We've gotta get out of here.
And don't think this gets you out of our science project.
translation.it: E non pensare che questo ti esoneri dal nostro progetto.

translation.en: I need an ETA on the surveillance truck and an ETA on lunch.
translation.it: Mi serve un ETA sul camion di sorveglianza e un ETA a pranzo.

translation.en: No onions on the burger this time.
No... onions.
[Arcannis] Ah, the smell of ripe diaper.
-They were here, all right. -Yeah.
Looks just like my lab.
They are getting stronger.
We must find my little runaways quickly.
translation.it: Dobbiamo trovare subito i piccoli fuggitivi.

translation.en: We are so close. I can smell them.
translation.it: Siamo vicini. Sento il loro odore.

translation.en: I will find you.
Do you mind?
We have to call our parents and the police. This has gone far enough.
translation.it: Dobbiamo chiamare i nostri genitori e la polizia. Ne ho abbastanza.

translation.en: We can't call anyone. You heard Lightspeed, Arcannis is tracking us.
translation.it: Non possiamo chiamare nessuno. Arcannis ci segue.

translation.en: He could be tracking our phones. You don't wanna put your family
translation.it: Rinctraccerà i telefoni. Non vuoi mettere in pericolo anche la tua famiglia, no?

translation.en: in danger too, do you? No! No kicking, please, space babies.
translation.it: Non vuoi mettere in pericolo anche la tua famiglia, no? Niente calci, per favore, bambini spaziali.

translation.en: Do not let them tear this car apart.
Let's find some music?
Okay. They love Lionel Richie.
-Seriously? -Hey. He's a national treasure.
translation.it: - Sul serio? - Ehi. È patrimonio nazionale.

translation.en: These guys get it.
What is this?
Oh no.
Okay, everybody be cool. You babies, be cool.
translation.it: Ok, calmi. Voi bambini, state calmi.

translation.en: You be cool.
Maybe we just hand these kids over to them.
translation.it: E se dessimo a loro i bambini?

translation.en: Are you kidding? Have you heard what the military does to aliens?
translation.it: Stai scherzando? Hai sentito cosa fa l'esercito agli alieni?

translation.en: -Can you cut the music? -But he's a national treasure.
translation.it: - Puoi spegnere la musica? - Ma è patrimonio nazionale.

translation.en: Where're you kids going today?
-Camping! -Road trip. Uh...
-Camping road trip, to go camping. -What he said.
translation.it: - Andiamo in campeggio. - Come dice lui.

translation.en: Is the air safe out here?
Just a precaution. We'll ask the questions.
translation.it: È una precauzione. Le domande le facciamo noi.

translation.en: We're checking cars for anything peculiar.
Nothin' peculiar here.
translation.it: Non c'è niente di strano qui.

translation.en: Uh, very, very normal car. We're all normal here. How are you?
translation.it: È un'auto normale. Siamo tutti normali. E lei?

translation.en: -We're gonna need to look in the trunk. -No problem.
translation.it: - Devo guardare nel bagagliaio. - Nessun problema.

translation.en: Uh, nice mask.
Any relation to Darth?
You packed a toaster.
I've never been camping. I had no idea what I'd need.
translation.it: Non sapevo di cosa avrei potuto aver bisogno.

translation.en: You've got roller skates here too.
I really didn't think it through on a lot of this. I see that now.
translation.it: Non ho pensato molto, li vedo solo ora.

translation.en: Is that a pool noodle?
Uhh... you never know.
So, uh, you're not much of a talker, are you?
translation.it: Lei non è un chiacchierone, vero?

translation.en: -Hey! Stop! -Bye-bye.
Get back here with my jeep! Get back here! Hey!
translation.it: Torna qui con la mia jeep! Torna qui! Ehi!

translation.en: Oh, we are so going to jail.
No, no, no! I don't wanna die this way!
-No! Huh! I don't wanna die this way! No! -[giggles]
translation.it: No! Non voglio morire così! No!

translation.en: -No! -[yells]
What's going on here?
-How-- -What happened?
-We've gotta get back on the road. -There was a bubble.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo ripartire. - C'era una gigantesca bolla.

translation.en: You saw a bubble?
I was in a bubble. A big purple, a big purple balloon.
translation.it: Ero in una bolla. Un grande palloncino viola.

translation.en: That doesn't make sense. Does that make sense?
Nope, no sense.
I was in a big bubble. I'm serious.
translation.it: Ero in una grande bolla. Davvero.

translation.en: It's those babies. One of 'em took my car.
translation.it: Sono quei bambini. Uno ha preso la mia auto.

translation.en: He chased me.
Whoa, whoa, whoa, a baby stole your car? Is your mask on too tight, Ronnie?
translation.it: Aseptta... un bambino ti ha rubato l'auto? Hai la maschera troppo stretta, Ronnie?

translation.en: No. I mean... I don't-- I don't think so.
[Reid] Whoa, baby.
put the car down.
Yes. Now.
No, don't throw it!
Well, he put it down.
No cookie for you, Titus! No cookie!
I'm so sorry. Have a nice day. [chuckles]
Okay, let's turn up that music.
-We gotta get off the road. -[Melanie] I know the perfect place.
translation.it: - Dobbiamo andarcene. - Conosco il posto perfetto.

translation.en: Mother of all things holy.
translation.it: Madre di tutte le cose sacre.

translation.en: Our sweet green Earth is living on borrowed time.
translation.it: La nostra dolce Terra verde sta vivendo tempi incerti.

translation.en: My guess puts these creatures at six, seven feet tall.
translation.it: Immagino che queste creature siano alte quasi due metri.

translation.en: Some kind of space predator.
Multiple arms, possibly tentacles.
Claws of a wolverine.
They probably shoot spider babies right outta their face.
-[sniffs] -[soldier] General.
translation.it: Generale. I vicini hanno visto un'auto partire due ore fa.

translation.en: -Neighbors saw a car leave two hours ago. -Get me that plate.
translation.it: Generale. I vicini hanno visto un'auto partire due ore fa. Voglio la targa!

translation.en: Put that in a bag with a number on it. Somebody hand me a clipboard.
translation.it: Mettilo in un sacchetto con un numero. Datemi una cartella.

translation.en: General, we got a hit at one of the checkpoints.
translation.it: Abbiamo un riscontro in un posto di blocco.

translation.en: Something they're calling super freaky-deaky.
Define freaky-deaky, Private.
-Babies. Babies. Babies -Babies? Babies? Babies?
What do you mean, babies?
Super-powered alien babies. Cute but deadly.
translation.it: Bambini alieni super potenti. Teneri ma mortale.

translation.en: They... probably shape-shifted into the form of their human victims.
translation.it: Si saranno adattati alla forma delle loro vittime umane.

translation.en: Put out an APB, all channels!
We're looking for infants...
of mass destruction.
You got anything in your date planner about surviving in the woods?
translation.it: Hai programmi per sopravvivere nel bosco?

translation.en: [Melanie] You're talking to Camp Nogiwa's "Camper of the Year," gamer boy.
translation.it: Parli con la campeggiatrice dell'anno di Camp Nogiwa.

translation.en: Come on, Fearless. Let's set up camp.
Hey. How about a hand? Aren't you supposed to be super strong?
translation.it: Ehi. Mi serve una mano. Non dovreste essere super forti?

translation.en: Oh, no, baby, don't--! Uh...
But please tell me you brought some toilet paper.
translation.it: Ti prego, dimmi che hai portato la carta igienica.

translation.en: Well, I've got some drive-through receipts in the car.
translation.it: Ho degli scontrini del fast food in auto.

translation.en: I was supposed to go to Red Lobster with my girlfriends tonight.
translation.it: Dovevo andare il granchio con le mie amiche stasera.

translation.en: -Are you gonna be able to fix that thing? -I'd better. Or I'm gonna miss Crabfest.
translation.it: - Riuscirai ad aggiustarlo? - Spero. O perderò il Crabfest.

translation.en: Besides, it's just a machine. There has to be a way.
translation.it: E poi è solo una macchina. Dev'esserci un modo.

translation.en: Uh, just seems like we're a little out of our league here, y'know?
translation.it: Sembra che sia tutto più grande di noi.

translation.en: Well, all we can do is try, y'know? Put in some effort?
translation.it: Beh, possiamo solo provare. Fare uno sforzo.

translation.en: We need to get this done, so we can get back to our science project.
translation.it: Dobbiamo farlo per poter tornare al progetto.

translation.en: Think that brain of yours can solve something other than a video game?
translation.it: Il tuo cervello può risolvere altro oltre ai videogiochi?

translation.en: Hey, little guy.
Uh, I wonder what you're thinkin'. I wonder--
[Melanie laughs] You said it, Titus.
Uh! Where have they gone?
Oh! You got me.
Hi.
Radio repair.
[phone] Rainbows and Bears.
Oh, come on.
-Titus! Do not drop a tree on your sister. -[giggles]
translation.it: Titus! Non far cadere gli alberi su tua sorella.

translation.en: -He did that on his own. -He's really getting better.
translation.it: - L'ha fatto da solo. - Sta davvero migliorando.

translation.en: [sighs] These pieces are so tiny. I can't see what I'm doing.
translation.it: Questi pezzi sono piccoli, non vedo cosa sto facendo.

translation.en: Let me try something.
Xander, can you make this?
Make big ones.
Oh, man. He's doing it. That does help.
translation.it: Oh, cavolo. L'ha fatto. Questo aiuta davvero.

translation.en: Look. Spin this one, it fits here.
translation.it: Guarda. Se lo giri, si incastra.

translation.en: -Okay. I see it. -There we go.
Pretty good, Xander.
You did it. Genius.
translation.it: Ce l'hai fatta. Sei un genio.

translation.en: Did you have any doubt?
Thanks.
Eight, nine, ten. Yup, still got 'em all.
translation.it: Otto, nove, dieci. Sì, le ho ancora tutte.

translation.en: Captain's log. I continue to wander this maze like a rat.
translation.it: Diario del capitano. Continuo a vagare nel labirinto come un topo.

translation.en: It's endless. Dead end.
Or not.
Captain's log. I hate mazes.
translation.it: Diario del capitano. Odio i labirinti.

translation.en: Bling?
You gotta be kidding me.
You gotta be kidding!
This is our best vantage point to scan the entire town.
translation.it: Questo è il miglior punto d'osservazione dell'intera città.

translation.en: Access the drones.
[mother] Are you listening to me?
translation.it: - Mi stai ascoltando? - Ti ascolto tutto il giorno.

translation.en: [daughter] I listen to you all day, Mother.Do you ever listen to me?
translation.it: - Mi stai ascoltando? - Ti ascolto tutto il giorno. Tu mi ascolti mai?

translation.en: [barista] That's a grande mocha half-caf macchiato, no whip, no foam.
translation.it: Un caffè corto macchiato, senza panna, senza schiuma.

translation.en: [piano teacher] …3, and 4. And 1, and 2, and 3--
translation.it: ... tre e quattro. Uno, due, tre e...

translation.en: [DJ] Yo yo. Takin' your calls. It's your boy, UP NYC on The Noize 105 FM.
translation.it: Rispondete! È il vostro amico, da New York, su The Noize 105.

translation.en: -Hit me up. Tell me what you wanna hear. -[mutters angrily]
Hey now, don't be shy. You on The Noize.
translation.it: Ehi, non essere timido. Sei su The Noize.

translation.en: Who's this?
This is Dr. Arcannis, overlord of cosmic domination.
translation.it: Sono il dottor Arcannis, signore del dominio cosmico.

translation.en: Yo, whaddup, Einstein? What song you wanna play on the hit list?
translation.it: Ehi, Einstein! Quale canzone vuoi ascoltare?

translation.en: I don't have time for this.
"I Don't Have Time For This" by Dreadlock Killah.
translation.it: "Non ho tempo ora" di Dreadlock Killah.

translation.en: -That's not what I mean. -"That's Not What I Mean"
by MC Saltshaka.
I am looking for babies.
"Looking For My Baby" by JJ Squash.
Stop this foolishness.
You will soon be my slaves, and this planet will be a wasteland!
translation.it: Presto sarete miei schiavi e questo pianeta sarà un deserto!

translation.en: Congratulations, my man. You just requested the new jam of the week.
translation.it: Congratulazioni. Hai appena richiesto la canzone della settimana.

translation.en: -How is that even possible? -[DJ] "You Will Be My Slaves,
translation.it: Com'è possibile? "Sarete i miei schiavi e questo pianeta sarà una terra deserta" di DJ Euripides.

translation.en: And This Planet Will Be My Wasteland" by DJ Euripides.
translation.it: "Sarete i miei schiavi e questo pianeta sarà una terra deserta" di DJ Euripides.

translation.en: [Melanie] At least we put this thing back together, but it's still not working.
translation.it: Almeno abbiamo rimesso tutto a posto, ma non funziona.

translation.en: -Maybe it's a power thing? -The signal is really weak.
translation.it: Forse è la potenza. Il segnale è debole.

translation.en: We need to, like, hijack a satellite for this.
Use some NASA-level gear.
Let me make a call to NASA. I'll get right on it.
translation.it: Oh, fammi chiamare la NASA. Ci penso io.

translation.en: [laughs] You're not half bad at this stuff when you put your mind to it.
translation.it: Sai, non sei così pessimo quando ti impegni.

translation.en: Uh, thank you?
Maybe it's all the fresh air and trees and bugs and going potty in the woods.
translation.it: Forse è l'aria fresca, gli alberi, e la cacca nel bosco.

translation.en: Opens up my mind a bit.
Wow. Look at you. Acknowledging there's a real world.
translation.it: Wow. Guardati. Riconosci che c'è un mondo reale.

translation.en: Maybe you're not a complete lost cause after all.
translation.it: Forse non sei una causa persa.

translation.en: [chuckles] Maybe not.
So... any plans after we graduate,
translation.it: Quindi, qualche piano dopo il diploma,

translation.en: or are you just gonna float around in virtual reality?
translation.it: o fluttuerai nella tua realtà virtuale?

translation.en: At least in the game world, you don't get called names, flunk a class,
translation.it: Almeno nel mondo dei videogiochi non ti insultano, bocciano

translation.en: or get turned down for prom. It's all about the fun.
translation.it: o rifiutano per il ballo. Ti diverti e basta.

translation.en: Here in the real world, I've got my fingers crossed for MIT.
translation.it: Beh, nel mondo reale, ho le dita incrociate per il MIT.

translation.en: Majoring in biochemical engineering.
Wow. You've got it all planned out.
Well, sure. Even those ducks are charting a course, Reid.
translation.it: Beh, certo. Anche quelle anatre tracciano una rotta, Reid.

translation.en: They don't just drift wherever the current goes.
translation.it: Non vanno alla deriva con la corrente.

translation.en: Is that all you're gonna do? Just drift?
translation.it: È quello che farai? Andrai alla deriva?

translation.en: I'm sick of working on this. Time to work on a sandwich.
translation.it: Sono stufa di lavorarci. È ora di farci un panino.

translation.en: -Hope you like pastrami. -[cooing] You guys like pastrami?
translation.it: Spero ti piaccia il pastrami. A voi piace?

translation.en: Little pastrami on rye. Got some kraut and mustard. I'm making Reubens.
translation.it: Pastrami su segale. Ho dei crauti, della senape. Faccio dei Reuben.

translation.en: -[whines] -Hey, don't get cranky.
Look at these two guys. They're not cranky. Look.
translation.it: Guardate questi. Non fanno i capricci.

translation.en: [in deep voice] Hi, Mr. Spoon. That's Dr. Spoon from space.
translation.it: Salve, Sig. Cucchiaio. Dott. Cucchiaio dallo spazio.

translation.en: Get away from me.
-I have a PhD! -[laughing]
How about, um...
I'm Colonel Mustard. What's the ruckus?
translation.it: Sono il colonnello Senape. Cos'è questo trambusto?

translation.en: [in French accent] Please, no fighting. I'm just a moist towelette.
translation.it: Vi prego, non litigate. Sono solo un asciugamano umido.

translation.en: Don't play with Dr. Spoon like that. You're gonna hurt him.
translation.it: Non giocate con il Dott. Cucchiaio, si farà male.

translation.en: Hey, let's play peekaboo.
-This guy loves peekaboo. -Yeah.
-Peek. Peek. -[squeals]
Peek. Peekaboo, huh?
-[Melanie] Don't scare him. -Here I go.
-[Melanie] You'll set his powers off. -Hmm.
If you can't see my face, where am I?
translation.it: Se non vedi la mia faccia, dove sono?

translation.en: -[Melanie] You got too big. -Peekaboo!
-[Melanie] I told you not to scare him! -[Reid] Okay, everybody in the car!
translation.it: - Ti ho detto di non spaventarlo! - Ok, tutti in macchina!

translation.en: Captain's log: more maze.
This part is different. Maybe it's a way out.
translation.it: Questa parte è diversa. Forse è una via d'uscita.

translation.en: Nope. Just the opposite.
That sounds...
alive.
Looks like Arcannis's monster had some babies.
translation.it: Il mostro di Arcannis ha avuto dei bambini.

translation.en: That's fitting. Killed by babies.
translation.it: Cade a pennello. Ucciso dai bambini.

translation.en: Very ironic.
[Melanie] At least he leaves a trail.
Xander! Xander!
-Xander, don't move. -[crying]
It's okay, Xander.
Hey! What-- [grunts]
The driver's still in there!
-Hey! The door is stuck! -Wait, hold on. One second, okay?
translation.it: - Lo sportello è bloccato! - Aspetta. Un attimo, ok?

translation.en: -Hey! -[cries]
Good boy, Titus. Okay, hold on.
Oh, why won't it...
budge!
[panting] I'm okay. How much milk is that kid drinking?
translation.it: Sto bene. Quanto latte beve quel bambino?

translation.en: -[people cheering] -[chuckles] Look at that. These babies could be heroes.
translation.it: Guarda. Questi bimbi potrebbero essere degli eroi.

translation.en: Yay, Titus.
-Or not. -Uh-oh.
What was in there?
Just a lot of priceless artifacts from a museum.
translation.it: Solo un inestimabile reperto di un museo.

translation.en: You know, 17th century Ming Dynasty, things that can never be replaced.
translation.it: Dinastia Ming del 17° secolo, cose che non possono essere sostituite.

translation.en: -And my house keys were in there. -It's not that long of a drop.
translation.it: E c'erano le chiavi di casa. Non è nulla di che. Va tutto bene.

translation.en: -I'm sure everything's fine. -[blasts]
translation.it: Non è nulla di che. Va tutto bene.

translation.en: Okay, pacifiers for everyone.
We better get outta here.
Oh no.
Keep your human skin suits on and your hands where we can see them.
translation.it: Tenete le tute di pelle umana e le mani dove possiamo vederle.

translation.en: Stand down, alien menace! I'm not an alien menace.
translation.it: - Fermate la minaccia aliena! - Non sono una minaccia aliena.

translation.en: That's just what an alien menace would say.
translation.it: È quello che direbbe una minaccia aliena.

translation.en: You shoot any spider babies outta your face, we will take you out.
translation.it: Se sparerai ragni dagli occhi, ti elimineremo.

translation.en: Do not be swayed by their cute demeanor and chubby cheeks!
translation.it: Non fatevi intenerire dalla loro dolcezza e dalle loro guanciotte!

translation.en: Quarantine this area right now.
Careful. Keep away from their mouth and hands.
translation.it: Attento. Tenere lontano da bocca e mani.

translation.en: Ew. We've got saliva.
Get a stool sample! Send those diapers to the CDC!
translation.it: Prendi un campione di feci! Manda i pannolini al CDC!

translation.en: They're just babies! Don't hurt them!
translation.it: Sono bambini! Non fate loro del male!

translation.en: They like Lionel Richie. Mostly his greatest hits.
translation.it: Amano Lionel Richie. Soprattutto i più grandi successi.

translation.en: Well, you've tested human.
I just need to know why you're working for them.
translation.it: Devo solo sapere perché lavorate per loro.

translation.en: This is a big misunderstanding.
All I did was accidentally open up a wormhole by playing a video game.
translation.it: Ho solo aperto per sbaglio un portale giocando a un videogioco.

translation.en: Planet Master? Do you know it?
And who are you calling on this?
The Russians? The French? The French Canadians?
translation.it: I russi? I francesi? I canadesi francesi?

translation.en: The Canadian Russians? Martian communists?
No! But there's someone else you should be worried about.
translation.it: No. Ma c'è qualcun altro di cui dovrebbe preoccuparsi.

translation.en: I can't even believe she told you that.
She did. And then she says to me that she wants to see other people.
translation.it: Sì. E poi mi dice che vuole vedere altre persone.

translation.en: Ouch, that's cold.
So she's single?
What? Did you seriously just say she--
Say what, Nate?
HQ--
Hold that thought.
I'm confused here.
We tracked an alien pod to you two,
but all our background searches come up with are Red Lobster, Sephora,
translation.it: ma tutte le ricerche precedenti danno Red Lobster, Sephora,

translation.en: Pinkberry and a website called acnesolutions.com
translation.it: Pinkberry e un sito web chiamato soluzionebrufolo.com

translation.en: What? [splutters] No, that's, uh, I've never heard of...
translation.it: Cosa? No... Non ne ho mai sentito parlare...

translation.en: In all my days as a Marine, a Navy Seal,
translation.it: Da quando sono nei Marines, nel Reparto Speciale,

translation.en: LAPD, FBI, and a Girl Scout Leader of the Year,
translation.it: LAPD, FBI e Ragazza Scout dell'anno,

translation.en: I've never heard such a load of--
translation.it: non ho mai sentito così tanto...

translation.en: [soldier] General, we have intruders. They're moving to--
translation.it: Ci sono degli intrusi. Vanno verso...

translation.en: Moving where?
Come back, soldier!
Perimeter, report!
Until I know what's going on, you will do nothing and go nowhere.
translation.it: Finché non saprò cosa succede, non andrete da nessuna parte.

translation.en: -Understood? -Let us help.
Do nothing, go nowhere.
translation.it: Non farete nulla e non vi muoverete.

translation.en: Who does she think she is? They can't keep us in here.
translation.it: Chi si crede di essere? Non possono tenerci qui. Dev'esserci una via d'uscita...

translation.en: -There's gotta be a way out of-- -Shhh.
translation.it: Non possono tenerci qui. Dev'esserci una via d'uscita...

translation.en: -I don't hear anything. -Exactly.
It's him, Dr. Arcannis.
[laughs] We're going for a little ride.
Fleech, get them in the sport utility vehicle.
Mark this day in your planet's history, hoomans.
translation.it: Segnate questo giorno nella storia del vostro pianeta, umani.

translation.en: -My little helpers are about to make me... -[babies crying] ...the most powerful being in the universe!
translation.it: I miei piccoli aiutanti faranno di me l'essere più potente dell'universo!

translation.en: What is this?
They're gone.
-What? Sh-- Should we go after them? -And do what?
translation.it: Cosa? Dobbiamo inseguirli? Per fare cosa?

translation.en: I saw the warning. But I didn't listen.
translation.it: Avevo visto l'avvertimento. Ma non ho ascoltato.

translation.en: I just wanted to win.
This isn't a game. It's real.
translation.it: Questo non è un gioco. È reale.

translation.en: The whole Earth is doomed, and it's my fault.
translation.it: Tutta la Terra è condannata ed è colpa mia.

translation.en: -Come on. You are Fearless. -No, don't call me that.
translation.it: - Dai, tu sei Impavido. - Non chiamarmi così.

translation.en: I'm not Fearless. I'm useless.
Just my luck. They're teethin'.
translation.it: Che fortuna, stanno mettendo i denti.

translation.en: I'm not as tasty as I look. Who am I kidding? I'm probably delicious.
translation.it: Non sono così gustoso come sembro. No, probabilmente sono delizioso.

translation.en: No use fighting it. There's no way out of this one.
translation.it: Inutile opporsi. Non c'è via d'uscita.

translation.en: I'm-- I'm never gonna see my babies again.
translation.it: Non rivedrò mai più i miei bambini.

translation.en: I can plan a Red Cross food drive, a homecoming dance,
translation.it: Posso organizzare una colletta della Croce Rossa, un ballo,

translation.en: I can raise $8,000 to save the elephants.
translation.it: raccogliere 8.000 dollari per salvare gli elefanti.

translation.en: But this? I'm-- I'm all out of ideas, Reid.
translation.it: Ma questo? Ho finito le idee.

translation.en: This would be so much easier if it was a video game.
translation.it: Sarebbe molto più facile se fosse un videogioco.

translation.en: Wait a minute.
What if this was a video game?
What would you do?
I don't know. l'd look around for tools, for power-ups.
translation.it: Non lo so. Cercherei attrezzi, potenziamenti.

translation.en: I wouldn't give up.
You know what? I've been living my whole life through a screen.
translation.it: Sai, ho vissuto tutta la vita attraverso uno schermo.

translation.en: What good is it being Fearless in a fake world?
translation.it: A cosa serve essere Impavido in un mondo falso?

translation.en: It's time to start being Fearless out here, where it counts.
translation.it: È ora di iniziare a essere Impavido qui, dove conta.

translation.en: Wow. Somebody just got off the couch.
translation.it: Wow. Qualcuno è appena sceso dal divano.

translation.en: Let's find a way outta here, huh?
Wait a minute. I can't believe I didn't think of it before.
translation.it: Aspetta un attimo. Non ci credo che non ci avevo pensato.

translation.en: That's a sat phone.
It's a super powerful walkie-talkie.
They link to satellites. NASA-level gear.
translation.it: Si collega ai satelliti. Roba a livello della NASA.

translation.en: It could boost our signal. You can fix the communicator.
translation.it: Potrebbe aumentare il segnale. Puoi sistemare il comunicatore.

translation.en: Yes! Now let's go stop Grinchface.
translation.it: Sì! Ora fermiamo Faccia di Grinch.

translation.en: Game on.
General. You're gonna have to trust me. We're the good guys,
translation.it: Generale. Deve fidarsi di me. Siamo i buoni e fermeremo i cattivi.

translation.en: -and we're gonna stop the bad guys. -If we can catch them in time.
translation.it: Siamo i buoni e fermeremo i cattivi. Se li prendiamo in tempo.

translation.en: [Reid] Whoa! The Obsidian.
It's even cooler in person.
translation.it: È ancora più bello di persona.

translation.en: You can take a selfie later!
translation.it: Puoi fare un selfie più tardi!

translation.en: Watch the road! [Reid] Whoa! Shrimp!
Didn't you say you've ridden a motorcycle before?
translation.it: Non hai detto che sai guidare la moto?

translation.en: -Yes, in Planet Master. -What?
Okay, it's now or never.
Sorry, this is a lot different than a rocket bike.
translation.it: Scusa, è molto diversa da una moto-razzo.

translation.en: Here goes.
I think we're on.
Hello? Come in, Captain. Captain, can you hear us?
translation.it: Pronto? Forza, Capitano. Capitano, mi sente?

translation.en: -[beeps] -[Captain] This is Lightspeed.
Good to hear your voice again.
-We got him! -Yeah!
-[Melanie] Arcannis has your babies. -What?
translation.it: - Arcannis ha i suoi bambini. - Cosa?

translation.en: They're on The Obsidian, but we won't let them get away.
translation.it: Sono sull'Obsidian ma non li lasceremo scappare.

translation.en: [Captain] I can finally pinpoint your location.
Do not let Arcannis absorb those babies' powers, or Earth is doomed.
translation.it: Non lasciate che Arcannis assorba i loro poteri o la Terra sia condannata.

translation.en: Okay, we can do this. I played every level. I know every inch of that ship.
translation.it: Ok, possiamo farcela. Ho fatto tutti i livelli, conosco bene quella nave.

translation.en: Arcannis is no match for my expert-- [spits]
-Oh! Swallowed a bug. -[beeps]
-[Melanie] Are we gonna catch them? -Yes, we will.
If we land on top of it, we can get inside through the engine intake ports.
translation.it: Se ci atterriamo sopra, entreremo dalle prese d'aria del motore.

translation.en: Wait, what?
-Trust me, I've done this before. -Not in real life.
translation.it: - Fidati, l'ho già fatto. - Non nella vita reale.

translation.en: Get ready to jump.
I will never be ready to jump!
translation.it: Non sarò mai pronta a saltare.

translation.en: [sighs] Or we can also go in this way.
If Fearless isn't giving up, then neither am I.
translation.it: Se Impavido non si arrende, non lo farò neanch'io.

translation.en: I just need a way out.
[toy] Baby Bottle Bonus.
Wherever heroes are needed.
Fastest nipple in the galaxy. Take that!
translation.it: Il capezzolo più veloce della galassia.

translation.en: Time to pick up the kids.
Oh my God. [sighs]
What? Huh? What?
Sweet George Washington.
Looks like those kids were right.
-I need birds in the air now! -Yes, ma'am.
No lobster-headed space invader gets a drop on me.
-Yes, ma'am. -If he thinks a ray gun
translation.it: - Sì, signora. - Se pensa che una pistola laser

translation.en: and pointy collar makes him king of the moon men, well, ha.
translation.it: e un colletto a punta lo faccia re dei lunari...

translation.en: He's never tangled with the human spirit.
translation.it: Non è mai incappato nello spirito umano.

translation.en: -Okay, I'm done. -Yes, ma'am.
Good.
Connect the chairs to the machine.
The absorption chamber is ready.
translation.it: La camera di assorbimento è pronta.

translation.en: Their little powers have blossomed so much.
translation.it: I loro piccoli poteri sono sbocciati.

translation.en: This will be an excellent harvest.
The isolated gene combinations from their DNA
translation.it: Le combinazioni geniche del loro DNA

translation.en: will be fed directly into this implant.
translation.it: verranno immesse direttamente in questo impianto.

translation.en: Activate The Extrapolator. I will be in my cocoon.
translation.it: Attiva l'Estrapolatore. Sarò nel mio bozzolo.

translation.en: No, go to the Settings menu, then Preferences, then Power Level.
translation.it: No, vai sulle impostazioni, poi "Preferenze" e "Livelli di potenza".

translation.en: Not Tools! Power Level!
Yes.
I can feel it.
So what's the plan?
You find the babies, I'm gonna stop this ship.
translation.it: Tu trovi i bambini, io fermerò questa nave.

translation.en: And how do we do that?
Simple.
All right, so I've memorized the scheme of this place.
translation.it: Ho memorizzato lo schema di questo posto.

translation.en: You're gonna keep going through this tunnel,
then you're gonna end up at a bunch of scary mechanical objects.
translation.it: finendo su un mucchio di spaventosi oggetti meccanici.

translation.en: Just gotta get through 'em.
-[Melanie] That sounds dangerous. -[Reid] It is. [chuckles] It is.
translation.it: - Devo solo superarli. - Sembra pericoloso. Lo è.

translation.en: Do not touch anything, okay?
Go to Lab A, not Lab B,
translation.it: Vai al laboratorio A, non B,

translation.en: because that's the one where he's growing the monsters and mutating the animals.
translation.it: perché è lì che coltiva i mostri e muta gli animali.

translation.en: I think there's a two-headed squid in there with swords for hands.
translation.it: Credo ci sia un calamaro a due teste con spade al posto delle mani.

translation.en: -It's okay. You'll be fine. -[Melanie] I think we should switch jobs.
[Reid] We can't. I'm the only one who knows how to get past security lasers
translation.it: No, sono l'unico che sa superare i laser di sicurezza

translation.en: and the security drones
and the security bees,
which is not a technical term, they're just bees.
translation.it: che non è un termine tecnico, sono solo api.

translation.en: [Melanie] Are you serious?
[Reid] But that's a lot of bees.
I'll sabotage the flight controls,
then I'll cut through the torture chamber and the racquetball court,
translation.it: attraverserò la camera delle torture e il campo da racquetball e...

translation.en: and I-- I don't know what else, uh...
translation.it: attraverserò la camera delle torture e il campo da racquetball e... Non so che altro...

translation.en: Yeah?
-I hate this plan. -See you in five.
translation.it: - Odio questo piano. - Tra cinque minuti.

translation.en: We're gonna laugh about this, I promise.
-[pilot 1] The aircraft is in sight. -[pilot 2] All right Jersey, stay focused.
translation.it: L'aereo è in vista. Ok, Jersey, resta concentrato.

translation.en: Let's keep it tight. There are civilians on board.
translation.it: Stiamo attenti! Ci sono dei civili a bordo.

translation.en: Let's fire a warning shot.
[pilot 1] This is by order of the U.S. government.
translation.it: Ordine del governo americano. Seguiteci fino a un punto di atterraggio

translation.en: You will follow us to a landing sight or be forced down.
translation.it: Ordine del governo americano. Seguiteci fino a un punto di atterraggio o sarete costretti a terra.

translation.en: -[pilot 2] He's out of control! -[pilot 1] Break away! Break away!
[pilot 2] This guy's not coming down quietly. We gotta take this thing down.
translation.it: Non scenderà piano. Dobbiamo riportarlo giù.

translation.en: General, we are awaiting missile authorization.
No, no, no, no! No! Oh, my gosh. I found you guys.
I fear for my life, but this is way better than a game.
translation.it: Temo per la mia vita, ma è meglio di un gioco.

translation.en: All right, hands up!
All of them...
-[yells] -Where I can see them.
That is all of them, right?
Land this ship, now.
Whoa! Oh! Yeah. More of that.
Holy guacamole! This thing's a lot of fun.
You found them!
So good news, bad news: the fastest way to land this ship is to crash it.
translation.it: Buone e cattive notizie: invece di atterrare, bisognerà abbatterla.

translation.en: We've gotta get someplace safe. Here, take them.
translation.it: Dobbiamo trovare un posto sicuro. Prendili.

translation.en: [pilot 2] Hold fire! Someone's taking it down from the inside.
translation.it: Non sparate! Qualcuno lo sta abbattendo dall'interno.

translation.en: Oh, no. No.
We've gotta escape. Escape in a pod of some kind, maybe--
translation.it: Dobbiamo scappare. Scappare in una capsula, magari...

translation.en: Hang on to something!
[robot] Your pod has been deployed.
Um... thanks.
The power courses through my veins.
translation.it: Il potere mi scorre nelle vene.

translation.en: Better, stronger,
supercharged.
The poopy diaper just hit the fan.
And poop just got real.
Now that I've been freed from that insipid game by that foolish boy,
translation.it: Ora che sono stato liberato da quel folle gioco da quel ragazzo stupido,

translation.en: I shall conquer your planet.
You'll have to go through me first.
translation.it: Prima dovrai passare su di me.

translation.en: I see you brought an army. [chuckles]
translation.it: Vedo che hai portato un esercito.

translation.en: So did I.
Fire!
You are insects.
And you will be destroyed like insects.
Today I declare myself King of Earth.
translation.it: Oggi mi dichiaro Re della Terra.

translation.en: First order of business, we are changing that name.
translation.it: Primo ordine, cambiamo nome al pianeta.

translation.en: Oh, this is bad. There's gotta be a way to stop him.
translation.it: Andiamo male. Dev'esserci un modo per fermarlo.

translation.en: -We've gotta get these babies to safety. -What's wrong with them?
translation.it: - Dobbiamo salvare questi bambini. - Che cos'hanno?

translation.en: I don't know.
Ever since they were in that machine, they've been totally out of it.
translation.it: Da quando erano in quella macchina, sono strani.

translation.en: Keep them safe. I have an idea.
-[babies moaning] -Wait. Reid, are you crazy?
Be careful!
I still don't wanna die like this! No! No! No!
What is that horrible--
You mock me with your vehicle of frozen confections?
translation.it: Mi prendi in giro con il tuo veicolo surgelati?

translation.en: Ah, the boy who's been in my way.
translation.it: Ah, il ragazzo che mi ha ostacolato.

translation.en: You've got what you want now. We're no threat to you.
translation.it: Hai avuto ciò che volevi. Non siamo una minaccia.

translation.en: Just leave. Go master another planet.
Ah. There they are.
I wondered where the little saplings had gone to.
translation.it: Mi chiedevo dove fossero finiti gli animaletti.

translation.en: I'm sorry, but I think it's time I end the Lightspeed lineage for good.
translation.it: Mi dispiace, ma credo sia il momento di porre fine al lignaggio di Lightspeed.

translation.en: I won't let you touch them!
I will destroy anyone I please.
Especially those babies.
Now step aside!
-Not gonna happen, green beans. -Huh?
I made this mess, and it's up to me to clean it up.
translation.it: Ho fatto io questo casino e sta a me ripulirlo.

translation.en: And if that means standing in your way, no matter what…
translation.it: E se questo significa ostacolarti, a qualsiasi costo…

translation.en: that's what I'm gonna do.
Wow, that was quite a speech. What are you gonna do, gamer boy?
translation.it: Wow, è stato un bel discorso. Cosa farai, giocatore? Mi abbatti con un discorso?

translation.en: -Shoot me down with a speech? -[groans]
translation.it: Cosa farai, giocatore? Mi abbatti con un discorso?

translation.en: It was inspiring. [groans]
I begin my reign with a show of force.
translation.it: Inizio il mio regno con una dimostrazione di forza.

translation.en: An example to those who would dare cross me.
translation.it: Un esempio per coloro che osano intralciarmi.

translation.en: Any more pathetic attempts at being a hero will be crushed.
translation.it: Qualsiasi altro patetico tentativo di fare l'eroe sarà annientato.

translation.en: Crushed to dust.
So you will learn the meaning
of being fearless.
What?
Ah! It's not possible!
She's breaking through the barrier!
-Titus? -[in Vin Diesel's voice] Goo-goo-ga.
The voice of Vin Diesel.
-High five. -High five.
They got 'em on the run people! Attack!
translation.it: Li hanno messi in fuga! All'attacco!

translation.en: You glow, girl.
[Reid] Yeah, Kira!
Wow. A natural-born gamer.
-[tires screeching] -Hop in. Let's do some damage.
Yeah you better run. Little toad.
translation.it: Sì, è meglio che scappi. Piccolo rospo.

translation.en: -[Reid yells] -[Melanie] Oh, no! Make it stop!
[chuckles] She can just do everything now, can't she?
There's something on Arcannis's neck.
translation.it: C'è qualcosa sul collo di Arcannis.

translation.en: If we take that out, I think we take his power.
translation.it: Se lo eliminiamo, prenderemo il suo potere.

translation.en: -She doesn't understand. -Yes, she does.
You've got your daddy's eyes. And they shoot lightning death blasts.
translation.it: Hai gli occhi di tuo padre. E sparano fulmini.

translation.en: So just remember what he taught you. You got this.
translation.it: Ricorda cosa ti ha insegnato. Puoi farcela.

translation.en: Yes!
Bullseye.
[groans] I can feel the power leaving.
translation.it: Sento il potere che se ne va.

translation.en: You can't steal superpowers.
No! No!
Noooo!
Better late than never!
Boy, that's a horrible catchphrase. Strike that.
translation.it: È una frase d'effetto terribile. Cancellatela.

translation.en: Captain! You're here!
You know what, frog face? You made me miss Crabfest.
translation.it: Sai, faccia di rana, mi hai fatto perdere il Crabfest.

translation.en: I haven't missed Crabfest in seven years.
translation.it: Non sono mai mancata in sette anni.

translation.en: -So I'm not in a good mood at all. -[yells]
translation.it: Non sono affatto di buon umore.

translation.en: Hey, she's good. What game is she from?
translation.it: Ehi, è brava. Da che gioco viene?

translation.en: No, she's all real.
I'm here to assist, general.
These must be your kids.
Seems like things are… well in hand.
translation.it: Sembra che le cose siano… ben gestite.

translation.en: Where's Kira?
She's the one without any...
powers.
Dada!
Hey. You got 'em.
-[Titus] Dada! -[groans]
-[Captain] They grow up so fast. -Hmm.
Where's the pacifier? It's time to calm them down.
translation.it: Dov'è il ciuccio? È ora di calmarli.

translation.en: Um... no pacifiers. Does anyone have any Lionel Richie?
translation.it: Niente ciucci. Qualcuno ha qualcosa di Lionel Richie?

translation.en: I got a Commodores album in my car.
Not the same thing, private.
translation.it: Non è la stessa cosa, privato.

translation.en: You! Play some Lionel Richie like your life depended on it.
translation.it: Tu. Metti subito una canzone di Lionel Ritchie.

translation.en: Wouldn't be the first time.
-We don't need an ambulance. -How about some blankets?
-What for? -I don't know.
We just always give you blankets.
You know, this was a crazy weekend,
but it might've been the best one of my life.
translation.it: ma forse è stato il migliore della mia vita.

translation.en: Really? It wasn't on your schedule.
I think you kinda owe me a crab dinner.
translation.it: Mi devi una cena a base di granchio.

translation.en: -Yeah? -Yeah.
All right. [chuckles] You got it.
But we still never got to that science project.
translation.it: Ma non abbiamo ancora fatto il progetto di scienze.

translation.en: Hey, you two. I think you might have dropped this.
translation.it: Ehi, voi due. Credo che vi sia caduto questo.

translation.en: Or maybe we did.
It is perfect. And nothing like I planned.
translation.it: È perfetto. E niente come avevo pianificato.

translation.en: Thank you, Fearless.
You saved the day when I couldn't. Not everyone would've done that.
translation.it: Hai salvato tutti al mio posto. Non tutti l'avrebbero fatto.

translation.en: A few days ago, I wouldn't have done that. The real world is a whole new level.
translation.it: Qualche giorno fa, non l'avrei fatto. Il mondo reale è ad un nuovo livello.

translation.en: I couldn't have gotten here without help from Buckethead.
translation.it: Non sarei potuto venire senza l'aiuto di TestaDiLatta.

translation.en: Wait a second. Buckethead?
Oh. You guys know each other?
-[Buckethead] What's up, Reid? -What? How?
[Buckethead] You know I got your back.
translation.it: Sai che ti copro le spalle.

translation.en: Who do you think got him his Baby Bottle Bonus?
translation.it: Chi credi gli abbia dato il bonus biberon?

translation.en: I guess we've finished the final level together, Elliot.
translation.it: Abbiamo finito il livello finale insieme, Elliot.

translation.en: [Buckethead] We sure did. We did it together.
Fearless and the Finisher.
Bye, Xander.
-Think happy thoughts. -[giggles]
Titus. One for the road?
-And you. -[gasps]
-Hmm. -I'll miss you.
Hang on to that, you two, in case we need you again.
translation.it: Non sparite, in caso avessimo bisogno di voi.

translation.en: -Where you headed next? -Wherever heroes are needed.
translation.it: Dove sei diretto? Ovunque servano gli eroi.

translation.en: Can you believe we got an A+ on our science project?
translation.it: Abbiamo preso 10 nel nostro progetto scientifico!

translation.en: That's a relief.
Otherwise my parents never would've forgiven me for trashing the house.
translation.it: O i miei non mi avrebbero mai perdonato per aver distrutto casa.

translation.en: -And we finally got our date. -[chuckles]
We really bent the laws of reality this weekend.
translation.it: Abbiamo infranto le leggi della realtà questo weekend.

translation.en: What if we're just characters in someone else's game?
translation.it: E se fossimo personaggi nel gioco di qualcun altro?

translation.en: I hardly know what's real anymore.
translation.it: Non so più nemmeno cos'è reale.

translation.en: This? This is real enough for me.
translation.it: Questo? Questo è abbastanza reale per me.

translation.en: Game on, Fearless!
Looks like we're taking it to the next level.
translation.it: Sembra che siamo al livello successivo.

translation.en: [baby giggles] Bye-bye.
